mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOP_CONTR ( TOP_CONTR_ID, TOP_CONTR_NM, TOP_CONTR_DIV, CLIENT_COMP_ID, TOP_CONTR_DATE, CONTR_ST_DATE, CONTR_END_DATE, PROD_NM, CONTR_AMOUNT, TOTAL_SERV_BOK_AMOUNT, AMOUNT1, AMOUNT2, AMOUNT3, AMOUNT4, AMOUNT5, DELIVERY_DEADLINE, DEMAND_INST_ID, REGIST_USER_NAME, REGIST_DATE, DEL_YN, TOP_CONTR_FILE_ID ) VALUES ( CONCAT('20240402BTCO',NEXTVAL(HLOT_SEQ)), #{topContrNm}, #{topContrDiv}, #{clientCompId}, #{topContrDate}, #{contrStDate}, #{contrEndDate}, #{prodNm}, #{contrAmount}, #{totalServBokAmount}, #{amount1}, #{amount2}, #{amount3}, #{amount4}, #{amount5}, #{deliveryDeadline}, #{demandInstId}, #{registUserName}, sysdate(), 'N', #{topContrFileId} )
mapper.select: SELECT TOP_CONTR_ID, TOP_CONTR_NM, TOP_CONTR_DIV, CLIENT_COMP_ID, TOP_CONTR_DATE, CONTR_ST_DATE, CONTR_END_DATE, PROD_NM, FORMAT(CONTR_AMOUNT, ',') AS CONTR_AMOUNT, FORMAT(TOTAL_SERV_BOK_AMOUNT, ',') AS TOTAL_SERV_BOK_AMOUNT, FORMAT(AMOUNT1,',') AS AMOUNT1, FORMAT(AMOUNT2,',') AS AMOUNT2, FORMAT(AMOUNT3,',') AS AMOUNT3, FORMAT(AMOUNT4,',') AS AMOUNT4, FORMAT(AMOUNT5,',') AS AMOUNT5, DELIVERY_DEADLINE, DEMAND_INST_ID, TOP_CONTR_FILE_ID, FILE_ID, FILE_PATH, ORIGN_FILE_NAME, (SELECT COMP_NM FROM COMP WHERE COMP_ID = TC.CLIENT_COMP_ID) AS CLIENT_COMP, (SELECT COMP_NM FROM COMP WHERE COMP_ID = TC.DEMAND_INST_ID) AS DEMAND_INST, CHANGE_FILE_NAME FROM TOP_CONTR TC LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON TC.TOP_CONTR_FILE_ID = A.FILE_ID WHERE TOP_CONTR_ID = #{topContrId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TOP_CONTR SET TOP_CONTR_NM = #{topContrNm}, TOP_CONTR_DIV = #{topContrDiv}, CLIENT_COMP_ID = #{clientCompId}, TOP_CONTR_DATE = #{topContrDate}, CONTR_ST_DATE = #{contrStDate}, CONTR_END_DATE = #{contrEndDate}, PROD_NM = #{prodNm}, DELIVERY_DEADLINE = #{deliveryDeadline}, DEMAND_INST_ID = #{demandInstId}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE(), MODIFY_USER_NAME = #{registUserName} WHERE TOP_CONTR_ID = #{topContrId}
